name: West Tussle
description:
West Tussle is a shooting game, where you can play with a friend, or alone controlling two or only one person. There is also a multiplayer mode on the local network.

Controls:

Cowboy:
A, S, D, W - Move
Space - Shoot

Maiden:
Right, Left, Pageup, Pagedown - Move
Kp 0 - Shoot
